d:
Tigress hadn’t felt anything in years—until Po returned from his spiritual journey, bringing with him the ability to unlock chakras.
While the other Furious Five responded with ease, Tigress remained closed.
To reach her, Po would need more than technique, but to touch something deeper.
And in doing so, he awakened a hunger she never knew she carried.

Story & Story board by Lummh
Illustrated by Skyrilius

New page every 4 Mondays, or already avalaible on Patreon/SubscribeStar
